summary: An email dated August 10, 2019, from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, forwarding documentation regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Register Number 73618-054). The subject indicates it contains information about Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email and the documentation being forwarded. Identified by his federal inmate register number 73618-054.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York
locations.context: The federal detention facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held. The sender is an Associate Warden at this location.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 10, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
It is sent from an Associate Warden at the MCC New York, the facility where Epstein died.
The subject is forwarding documentation in their possession regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Reg. No. 73618-054).
The email's existence suggests internal communication regarding Epstein's case and documentation following his death.
The attachment name 'Mil -8211 'ward Roo' appears garbled but may reference a document or report number.
